alert.note: Alert for City of Petersburg; Dinwiddie; Prince George (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 3:31PM EDT until June 16 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN PRINCE GEORGE AND NORTHEASTERN DINWIDDIE COUNTIES AND THE SOUTHWESTERN CITY OF PETERSBURG... At 331 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Sutherland, or near Dinwiddie, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Prince George and northeastern Dinwiddie Counties and the southwestern City of Petersburg, including the following locations... Petersburg Airport, Burgess, Templeton, Addison and Reams. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: City of Petersburg; Dinwiddie; Prince George
